segment.source: How to Change Package Properties
segment.target: How to Change Package Properties

segment.source: How to Change Package Properties
segment.target: How to Change Package Properties

segment.source: How to Change Package Properties
segment.target: How to Change Package Properties

segment.source: You can use the following procedures to modify an Application Virtualization package name and its associated comments.
segment.target: You can use the following procedures to modify an Application Virtualization package name and its associated comments.

segment.source: If this is the first time the package has been created, you can also change the sequencing parameter block size, which determines how a sequenced application package is streamed from an Application Virtualization Server to an Application Virtualization Desktop Client.
segment.target: If this is the first time the package has been created, you can also change the sequencing parameter block size, which determines how a sequenced application package is streamed from an Application Virtualization Server to an Application Virtualization Desktop Client.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: When selecting a block size, consider the size of the SFT file and your network bandwidth.
segment.target: When selecting a block size, consider the size of the SFT file and your network bandwidth.

segment.source: A file with a smaller block size takes longer to stream over the network, but it is less bandwidth intensive.
segment.target: A file with a smaller block size takes longer to stream over the network, but it is less bandwidth intensive.

segment.source: Files with larger block sizes might stream faster, but they use more network bandwidth.
segment.target: Files with larger block sizes might stream faster, but they use more network bandwidth.

segment.source: Through experimentation, you can discover the optimum block size for streaming applications on your network.
segment.target: Through experimentation, you can discover the optimum block size for streaming applications on your network.

segment.source: The remainder of the package properties on the Properties tab is automatically generated and cannot be modified on this tab.
segment.target: The remainder of the package properties on the Properties tab is automatically generated and cannot be modified on this tab.

segment.source: To change the package name or comments
segment.target: To change the package name or comments

segment.source: Click the Properties tab.
segment.target: Click the Properties tab.

segment.source: In the Package Name text box, enter or edit the single name used for the package, which can contain multiple applications.
segment.target: In the Package Name text box, enter or edit the single name used for the package, which can contain multiple applications.

segment.source: In the Comments text box, optionally enter or edit any comments.
segment.target: In the Comments text box, optionally enter or edit any comments.

segment.source: The suggested best practice is to provide detail information about the package and sequencing.
segment.target: The suggested best practice is to provide detail information about the package and sequencing.

segment.source: From the File menu, select Save.
segment.target: From the File menu, select Save.

segment.source: To change the block size
segment.target: To change the block size

segment.source: Click the Properties tab.
segment.target: Click the Properties tab.

segment.source: On the Block Size drop-down list, select 4 KB, 16 KB, 32 KB, or 64 KB.
segment.target: On the Block Size drop-down list, select 4 KB, 16 KB, 32 KB, or 64 KB.

segment.source: From the File menu, select Save.
segment.target: From the File menu, select Save.
